Description:
PRIME COURT POSITION, GRACIOUS FAMILY HOME, SOLAR POWER, APP.1070 SQM.
Within walking distance of the Village centre, schools, parklands and sports grounds. Set amongst leafy surrounds No. 5 has generous proportions throughout, with wide verandah, elegant entrance, formal lounge and dining, second space includes Blackwood kitchen, meals and another living room. Four bedrooms (BIR's), main with ensuite, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Double garage with room for caravan/boat storage. Split System, Woodburner, Solar Panels and more to inspect. A perfect home in a perfect position with perfect surrounds, inspect now!

Description:
Centrally located
Offering privacy from the street with a quaint cottage feel is this delightful three bedroom, two bathroom family home. With a welcoming verandah protecting the home from the northerly summer sun.
The living room has vaulted ceilings giving a sense of space.
Galley style kitchen & dining area overlooking the garden.
A large covered entertainment area is ideal for those who love the outdoors & BBQ's.
A large stand alone double garage with separate roller doors.
There is ample backyard secured by a set of double gates.
Perfect for those seeking to be close to all the amenities, schools, shopping centre & cafes.

Description:
ARCHITECT DESIGNED, CUSTOM BUILT, LOADS OF STYLE AND BIG BAY VIEWS!
A short walk to the Drysdale village, schools and parklands. Rumpus room downstairs with doors opening to undercover patio area and matured landscaped gardens, two bedrooms (BIR'S) on this level and bathroom. Upstairs, plenty of room to entertain with large area including living, meals, gourmet kitchen and french doors opening to balcony, absolute magic ... water views are breathtaking, the master bedroom has WIR, large bathroom(spa bath) operates as 2 way, powder room as well. Features include gas log fire, split system, pantry, built-in entertainment unit, fans, cellar, polished floors, loads of storage, water feature, matured fruit trees, tank, surround sound, quality fittings and so much more. Double garage, garden shed and access for caravan / boat. No. 55 is fantastic and ticks all the boxes while creating a beautiful feel of home.

Description:
Luxury Executive Home with stunning Views
Available for viewing this Saturday 19th July by appointment. call 0409 289 230
A most prestigious address with expansive views over Corio Bay and Geelong to the west and rural views to the east. This luxurious family home consists of four large bedrooms and separate study. Master with dressing room, enormous ensuite including large spa bath, double shower and twin hand basins. Large family bathroom. Upstairs living area with wet bar and balcony, making the most of the spectacular views. Open plan kitchen (with island bench and butlers pantry), dining and living area leading out to undercover alfresco area complete with outdoor kitchen. Formal downstairs lounge and powder room.
Other features include, 5kw solar panel system, double garage, separate drive leading to additional garage with room for boat/caravan, ample storage and landscaped gardens with swim spa and spa.

Description:
Lifestyle Second To None on 2320m2!
This immaculate 3 or 4 bedroom plus study property comes to the market with so much to offer the new owners! Set on a 2320m2 allotment the Federation style home is spacious and includes many period touches- verandahs, high ceilings, decorative cornices, feature windows, beautifully polished cypress pine & hardwood flooring- but is modern, light and bright as well. From the grand entrance if you go left you will find 4th bedroom/sitting room, 2 other double bedrooms, bathroom & laundry. To the right of the entrance is the study and master suite which includes full ensuite & dressing room. Double doors access the outdoor living area from this room. The formal lounge is in the centre of the home with open plan living incorporating the kitchen, meals and family rooms at the rear. This part of the home overlooks the pool, family entertainment area and the gardens. Excellent storage, ducted vacuum system, central heating.
The man of the home will be beside himself when he sees the garaging and shedding this property offers- large double garage attached to the home with internal access plus freestanding 14m x 7m garage and another 18m x 6m shed. Just perfect to house the boys toys with loads of room to tinker! The gardens are like a parkland and include a small orchard of about 20 trees. Situated in one of the fastest growing areas on the Bellarine Peninsula with the famous Bellarine Rail Trail running behind the property this home has too many features to list and your inspection is a must.
Insights: 30 Station Street, DRYSDALE VIC 3222 was last sold in 2014 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in DRYSDALE have recently been sold.

Description:
Contemporary acreage lifestyle with views
Set on approx. 1 acre of grounds, this 4 bedroom home with 4 living areas is contemporary, light-filled and big on lifestyle! The 2-storey floor plan offers a private parent's retreat upstairs showcasing calming You Yangs and Bay views. Downstairs a tiered deck provides indoor/outdoor living options, with floor-to-ceiling glazing and French doors embracing natural light and tranquil, semi-rural views. Polished hardwood floors, European appliances and impressive undercover entertaining denote quality and style. The in-ground pool and established subtropical garden are a welcome surprise!
The tiered deck approach sets the scene for modern living indoors. On level 1, the open floor plan has a circular flow, connecting living and dining zones. For relaxation, choose the bright sitting room or sunken formal lounge. Both face north boasting seamless access to the deck through French doors. RC AC assists comfort here.
Flow continues from the sitting room, to the kitchen/living/dining hub and back to the entrance. The kitchen has a high-end feel with Kleenmaid appliances (900mm electric oven with gas cooktop), soft-close cabinetry and step-in pantry. Living and dining bask in the warmth of a wood burning fire. Dining merges with the undercover entertaining area, set under a striking curved roofline. Generously proportioned, and designed for year-round use, this outdoor room links with a spacious lawn and the pool area.
The minor bedroom wing buds off the entrance hall to the west, and houses a fully-tiled bathroom with bath and in situ shower, separate toilet and three bedrooms with built-in robes. The largest bedroom boasts French doors to a private balcony; the smaller, an optional study.
The views and tranquillity upstairs are reserved for the parents. In the lofty living area, extensive glazing frames Bay, You Yangs and treetop views, and a wide glass slider accesses a roomy balcony directed at the view. The L-shaped design accommodates a generous study nook. In the master bedroom, the walk-in robe and 2-way en suite emphasize the self-contained feel.
The grounds are graced with beautiful deciduous trees and a large rear paddock with vegetable gardens and chicken coop providing a level of self-sufficiency. The gated driveway provides 2 secure parking spots and leads to a DLUG with workshop and single carport.
A household water treatment plant is connected to garden irrigation. A 5000L water tank aids irrigation and tops up the solar heated pool.
This semi-rural lifestyle property is convenient to family amenities and sought-after schools. View without delay!
- Contemporary 4 BR family home with 4 living areas on 1 acre of landscaped grounds
- You Yangs and Bay views from upper level living area and master BR with WIR and en suite
- Formal lounge, sitting room and kitchen/living/dining with outdoor connections downstairs
- Minor bedroom wing with 3 BRs with BIRs, modern bathroom and toilet
- Impressive outdoor living and entertaining room links to subtropical pool area
- Gated driveway, DLUG with workshop, single carport and large back paddock
Land: 4047 sq m approx.
Insights: 68-70 Whitcombes Road, DRYSDALE VIC 3222 was last sold in 2014 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in DRYSDALE have recently been sold.

Description:
Stylish & Affordable Family Living
If you have been looking for a home that will exceed your expectations then take a look at this stylish and functional newly built home from the award winning Porter Davis Quality Builders.
From the moment you walk in you will be amazed at the stunning display of space & features this unique home has on offer for the astute buyer with an eye for detail. Situated in the highly sought after Curlewis Parks Estate. Offering a beautiful a sense of space with open plan living, neutral tones throughout with large light filled windows to drench the home in natural light.
The heart of this home is the spacious designer kitchen with Caesar stone island bench with a walk in pantry, S/S appliances, dishwasher, heaps of cupboard storage overlooking the open plan lounge, dining room offering ample space for the largest of families. The home also has a separate formal lounge room with plenty of space for the largest of suites.
The home offers 4 generous sized bedrooms including three with built in robes, the master comprising of a walk in wardrobe The master bathroom features a 1200 insitu shower and a semi frameless glass with twin vanity units offering loads of bench & storage space.
Additional features consist of: gas ducted heating throughout.
Featuring beautiful timber floating floors, a stunning open plan living area and a designer gourmet kitchen with stone bench tops and an island bench. Gas ducted heating, solar hot water, 2 car garage with remote, landscaped front yard. All this 20 minutes from Geelong CBD and close to the proposed new Curlewis shopping complex.

Description:
GREAT FAMILY HOME, WALK TO TOWN AS WELL AS ENJOY THE BAY VIEWS.
Bay, Geelong and rural views with landscaped gardens. Master built, great design with flexible living as well as light and bright throughout and solar passive influence. Downstairs opens to generous entrance, formal lounge, open plan area including dining, fabulous kitchen and living, both rooms open to undercover entertaining space. Master bedroom is downstairs with ensuite, laundry and powder room. Second level the rumpus room provides third living, balcony, three more bedrooms, all with BIR'S, study nook......could operate as kids retreat. Features include split system, duc gas heating, bay windows, d/washer, pantry, wide stairwell, loads of storage, alarm system, sprinkler system and quality fittings. Double garage and second entrance to another garage/workshop. Central position, walk to shops, parkland and schools.........a real winner.

Description:
PERFECT HOME WITH COURT POSITION IN THE HEART OF THE DRYSDALE VILLAGE
Attention to detail and lots of extras with this Bell and Fulton home, only four year old and on approx. 715 SQM of land. Gracious entrance, master bedroom with ensuite (big shower) and WIR, formal lounge, open plan area including dining, living and fabulous kitchen, doors open wide to 2 undercover decking entertaining areas. Two more bedrooms both with three BIR'S, central bathroom and separate toilet, extra large laundry. All rooms have generous proportions. Features include central heating, split system, fans, loads of storage and cupboard space, pantry, dishwasher, speakers, temperature controlled hotwater service, duc. vac., termite treated, water tank for grey water and quality fittings. Garage with direct internal access and separate side access to second large double shed/garage/workshop ( 7m x 9m, with 2.8 and 3 metre clearance), ideal for caravan , boat. Inspect to appreciate this quality home.

Position to shops is excellent.

Description:
A spacious lifestyle in Curlewis Parks
Sited in the popular Curlewis Parks Estate, this contemporary family home is perfectly designed for the corner allotment. The striking double-storey facade paints a suitable picture of what's inside - a grand and stylish 4 bedroom home with 3 wet areas and 3 living zones. Perfect for a growing family!
The floor plan places emphasis on private sleeping quarters and easy access to the social/ entertaining areas. Put simply, entertaining and dining downstairs, bedrooms upstairs! Engineered stone bench tops in the kitchen and wet areas will impress, as will the striking yet neutral decor.
Downstairs, the protected entrance provides access to a light-filled lounge; elegant and comfortable with corner floor-to-ceiling glazing. Large modern floor tiles lead the eye to the open plan kitchen/meals/living zone, flooded with light and backyard views.
The meals area is spacious, easily accommodating 8 and connects with the alfresco space for an indoor/outdoor feel. The undercover alfresco wraps the rear and side of the home for terrific outdoor entertaining. The living zone is another sizable family-orientated space, visible from the kitchen for supervising and hosting.The functional kitchen with walk-through pantry (to the laundry and backdoor) makes catering fun. Enjoy cooking with stainless steel Westinghouse appliances - 900mm electric oven with gas cooktop, dishwasher and range hood. Glass splash backs and modern timber-effect cabinetry complete the contemporary look. A convenient powder room services the lower level.
Upstairs is dedicated to quiet time boasting 4 queen-sized bedrooms and a spacious living area adjoining a study. The master, at the rear is inviting with double boudoir doors, wide picture window, walk-in robe and plush en suite. The 3 minor bedrooms feature built-in robes and share a sleek family bathroom with bath, shower and separate WC. The living area and study are a highlight, at the facade with extensive glassing capturing rural views; the study with bi-fold access to a balcony offering Bay and You Yangs vistas. The open stairwell provides a mezzanine association between the upstairs living and downstairs lounge.
The DLUG is generously proportioned and boasts internal and backyard access. A detached SLUG is secure within the fence line accessed through double gates. 2 off street parking spots on the driveway.
Extras include; quality window furnishing (double bracket roller blinds and sheer curtains), Bonaire ducted heating and cooling, split system AC to down stairs living, security strength fly screens, lockable windows, spacious under stair storage and linen cupboards.
* Corner allotment in the family centric Curlewis Parks estate
* Grand and stylish double-storey home for a growing family
* 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 powder room, 3 living zones and spacious alfresco entertaining
* Separate lounge and living hub downstairs, upper level living with Bay and You Yangs views
* Master bedroom with double doors, plush en suite and walk-in robe
* Generous DLUG with internal access plus detached single garage
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 30/60/90 days
Land: 507 sq m approx.
Insights: 35 other 4 bedroom house in DRYSDALE have recently been sold.

Description:
Luxurious near-new home with sophisticated appeal
Skip the stress of building and move straight in to your near-new, luxuriously appointed home!
This beautifully designed three bedroom abode will exceed your expectations.
Set in idyllic Carlotta Place, the north-facing home overlooks landscaped parkland and enjoys a quiet outlook with very little through traffic.
The interior feels contemporary and grand, with neutral tones that compliment any colour scheme. Heightened ceilings and doorways amplify space, and natural light floods every room. Windows throughout are finished with elegant shutter style blinds.
At the heart of the home, the open plan kitchen/living/dining hub has a light and airy feel. You'll enjoy easy access to the private backyard and undercover decked entertaining area via sliding stacker doors, which retract to provide an expansive indoor/outdoor living zone. Light is easily filtered and privacy maintained with stylish sliding panel glide blinds.
The central chef's kitchen overlooks the living space, dining and alfresco areas. Extravagant 40mm Caesarstone benchtops will impress, and stainless steel appliances include a 900mm Technika electric oven with gas cooktop, glass canopy rangehood and Bellissimo dishwasher. The island bench with breakfast bar is ideal for informal dining. The spacious walk-in pantry houses the fridge, and hides the clutter!
The rear of the home boasts an expansive and private master suite. It features a fully fitted walk-through robe with 'His' and 'Hers' sections, plus a light-filled and contemporary ensuite. Luxurious inclusions, such as the double shower with rain head and hand-held rose and the soft-close toilet, mean you may never want to leave!
The two large queen-size bedrooms include built-in robes with sliding doors and are near the central bathroom, which features a large floating vanity, huge shower, niche cut-out, and a deep luxurious bath.
A separate lounge (or optional 4th bedroom) speaks of uninterrupted TV viewing and quiet time overlooking the park.
The laundry is generous with plenty of storage and direct backyard access. The property also features a double lock-up garage with secure internal access.
The backyard is private, secure and elegantly landscaped with lush lawn, bluestone pavers and Lilydale toppings.
Additional features include ducted gas heating throughout, reverse-cycle air-conditioning to the living areas, endless gas/solar hot water and fibre optic cabling installed for high-speed Internet and flawless TV reception.
A contemporary and luxurious home for convenient, easy living!
- Set on quiet lane with little through traffic, adjacent to parkland and extra OSP
- 3 BRs, master with walk-through robe and ensuite, others with BIRs
- Open plan kitchen/living/dining adjoins alfresco and backyard
- Separate lounge (or 4th BR) for quiet time or dedicated TV viewing
- Sleek wet areas with contemporary decor and large showers, main bathroom with bath
- DLUG, ducted heating, RC AC, endless gas/solar hot water and fibre optic cabling
Land: 400 sq m approx.
